ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Radio King; Airplot '77; If Rockey Appeared in Other Movie and TV Spots; An Afternoon at an Artist's Studio; The Cracked Guide to Soccer; The Awakening...; Cottonin to Carter!; A Cracked Look at Summer Camps; The Cracked Guide to Babysitting; Leverne & Shurley
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.An artist paints his thumb in a portrait.
After seeing the state of the world a newborn chick returns to its egg.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:42:56. [Issue ID 250506]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Don Orehek,Bill Ward,Howard Nostrand,John Severin,Warren Sattler
ComicInfo.Inker: Don Orehek,Bill Ward,Howard Nostrand,John Severin,Warren Sattler
